verbs.description: The idea that [ARG1: agencies like the FBI] [V: are] [ARG2: above the Constitution] is a more serious threat to democracy than anything that has been credibly alleged against Hillary Clinton or Donald Trump .

[ARG1: The idea that agencies like the FBI are above the Constitution] [V: is] [ARG2: a more serious threat to democracy than anything that has been credibly alleged against Hillary Clinton or Donald Trump] .
The idea that agencies like the FBI are above the Constitution is a more serious threat to democracy than anything that [V: has] been credibly alleged against Hillary Clinton or Donald Trump .
The idea that agencies like the FBI are above the Constitution is a more serious threat to democracy than anything that has [V: been] credibly alleged against Hillary Clinton or Donald Trump .

The idea that agencies like the FBI are above the Constitution is a more serious threat to democracy than [ARG1: anything] [R-ARG1: that] has been [ARGM-MNR: credibly] [V: alleged] [ARGM-PRD: against Hillary Clinton or Donald Trump] .
